overview: Social designer, prizewinner writer, educator and stage director. Serial social entrepreneur, startupper. Co-founder of Timbuktu Magazine, the first iPad magazine for children and the first project to bring the best methods of education to the consumer market. Founder and Executive Director of SFERRACAVALLI - International Festival of Sustainable Imagination. She loves team work, public schools, humans as resources, to re-think production processes, workflows and social environments. Passionate about simple and meaningful interactions and I’m a very hard worker. Master of theatre, communication, dance, user experience design, pedagogy.
